text:
STRANGELY, EVERY THING WE BUILD TURNS OUT TO BEA SPORTS CAR.

Over 20 years ago, we built a Porsche you can share. Exhilaration for five. Thrills for every road.

The Cayenne redefined SUV sport performance. From the efficiency of the E-Hybrid,

to the ferocity of the Cayenne Turbo GT.

That family pedigree just got stronger. This time, the feeling is electrified.

The Cayenne Turbo Electric accelerates from O—60 mph in 2.4 seconds and completes the quarter-mile dash in just 9.9 seconds.

It has a suspension comfortable for rocky roads,

yet sharp enough for the Nurburgring.

An interior crafted with handpicked materials.

An exterior with aeroblades that make air itself cooperate.

Whether it's powered by the growl of a V8, or the instant surge of electrification, every Cayenne is built for one thing:

to make you feel.

Porsche. There is no substitute.

—ORS>C ee

© 2025 Porsche Cars North America, Inc.
